level.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA UNIVERSAL SERVICES (ยง 15-2802)

level.text: 2802.1 District of Columbia Universal Services shall consist of the followingervices:
Voice grade access to the public switched network, with the ability to place andeceive calls or its functional equivalent;
Minutes of use for local service provided at no additional cost to end users;
Access to emergency services, including, access to 911 and enhanced 911 (E911)ervices;
Toll limitation services for qualifying low-income consumers at no charge to theustomer.
2802.2 The Commission may expand universal services to be supported by theistrict of Columbia Universal Service Trust Fund (DC USTF or Fund) after noticend comment.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 8198 (October 3, 2003);s amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 8585, 8586 (October, 2011); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 12141 (October 19,012).
